sentences.en: Acupressure is used to release tension spots in the shoulders and neck.
sentences.cn: 指压按摩用于缓解肩部和颈部的紧张。

sentences.en: fancy seeing her in this neck of the woods.
sentences.cn: 想不到在树林这里看到她。

sentences.en: He had twined his chubby arms around Vincent's neck.
sentences.cn: 他胖乎乎的双臂搂住文森特的脖子。

sentences.en: He patted his horse’s neck.
sentences.cn: 他拍了拍马脖子。

sentences.en: He picked the dog up by the scruff of the neck.
sentences.cn: 他一把抓住狗的脖子把它拎起来。

sentences.en: He shouted at his brother, his neck veins bulging.
sentences.cn: 他朝他的兄弟吼叫，脖子上青筋暴突。

sentences.en: He sustained serious neck injuries after he broke someone's fall.
sentences.cn: 有人坠落压在他身上，致使他颈部受重伤。

sentences.en: I also had a strange feeling in my neck.
sentences.cn: 我的脖子感觉也很奇怪。

sentences.en: I shivered and pulled my scarf more tightly round my neck.
sentences.cn: 我打了个寒战，用围巾把脖子围得更紧了。

sentences.en: I still love you even though I'd like to wring your neck.
sentences.cn: 虽然我想掐死你，但我还是爱你的。

sentences.en: I'm up to my neck in rearranging the match.
sentences.cn: 我一心忙于重新安排这场比赛。

sentences.en: It tickled the hairs on the back of my neck.
sentences.cn: 它挠得我后脖梗儿的绒毛直痒痒。

sentences.en: Kernaghan missed the United game after he ricked his neck.
sentences.cn: 克纳汉因为扭伤脖子而错过了联赛。

sentences.en: Mike rubbed the back of his neck.
sentences.cn: 迈克揉了揉后颈。

sentences.en: She flung her arms around my neck and kissed me.
sentences.cn: 她突然张开手臂搂住我的脖子，然后吻了我一下。

sentences.en: She had a mass of golden hair, which she wore in a coil at the nape  of her neck.
sentences.cn: 她有一头金发，盘在脖子后面。

sentences.en: She raised her hands to the back of her neck.
sentences.cn: 她举起双手放于颈后。

sentences.en: She wore a fine chain about her alabaster neck.
sentences.cn: 她细腻光滑、美丽白皙的脖子上戴着一条精致的链子。

sentences.en: The dog picked up the puppy and carried it by the scruff of the neck into the house.
sentences.cn: 那条狗叼住小狗的后颈，把它叼进了屋子。

sentences.en: The red dress had slim black piping around the neck.
sentences.cn: 这条红裙的领口有细细的黑色滚边。

sentences.en: The seven-year-old was found crying with scratches on his face and neck.
sentences.cn: 那名7岁男孩被发现时正在哭泣，脸部和颈部都有划伤。

sentences.en: they were up to their necks in debt.
sentences.cn: 他们债台高筑。

sentences.en: You have a lot of tension in your neck muscles.
sentences.cn: 你的颈部肌肉很紧张。

words.tran_cn: 变细；与…亲嘴；宰杀（neck的过去分词）
变细；使变窄（neck的现在分词）

phrases.tran_cn: ◎【赛马】以一颈之差(获胜或失败)
(非正式)受到严厉谴责（或惩罚）

phrases.phrase: have the neck to do something

phrases.tran_cn: 脖子发僵，斜颈；顽固之人
手边的事情太多；忙的不可开交

trans.tran_cn: 颈，脖子，衣领，海峡，[地]岩颈
trans.tran_en: the part of your body that joins your head to your shoulders, or the same part of an animal or bird
if two people are necking, they kiss for a long time in a sexual way

trans.tran_cn: 搂着脖子亲吻，相拥互吻，变狭窄
使变细，与…搂着脖子亲吻
